from notebookutils import mssparkutils

timeout_in_seconds = 60 * 30

# Builds protected characteristic DIMs
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_diversity_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_disability_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_religion_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_sxo_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
# Builds protected characteristic FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_secure_info_fact', timeout_in_seconds)

# Builds hr DIMS
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_personnel_area_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_personnel_sub_area_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_contract_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_payband_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_position_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_pins_location_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_organisation_unit_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_costcenter_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employeegroup_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_payroll_area_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_work_schedule_dim', timeout_in_seconds)

mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_fact', timeout_in_seconds)

mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_dim', timeout_in_seconds)

mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_leavers_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_specialism_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_absence_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_leave_entitlement_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim', timeout_in_seconds)

# Build full FACT table
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_record_fact', timeout_in_seconds)
